TrackBack is a topic that I know has been discussed from time to time 
and that some of you have been active in its development.

In taking all of the recent discussion and 
experimentation with TrackBack and related 
interfaces, I thought it would be helpful to draft 
some suggestions for consideration for the next 
generation of the interface. (One of the sections is "Make TrackBack 
even more RESTful.") 

http://www.mplode.com/tima/archives/000206.html

This document is meant to be a starting point to further the 
constructive and valuable experimentation done so far. Thoughts? 

<tim/>
